name: Visitor from the Scribble World
description:
Visitor from the Scribble World

Play through a compelling RPG adventure and solve minipuzzles to help the scribble world visitor to go back home. Made for Scribble Jam.

Controls

Move: Arrow keys or WASD
Attack: Enter or Space
Pick/Interact: Shift or E
Minigame interactions: Left mouse button

Made using Godot game engine. Our second jam game and first game with Godot!

Made by Olli (https://ollipa.itch.io/), Adarsh (https://adarshk7.itch.io/) and Sini.

Background music from PlayOnLoop.com
